mapper.select:
select t1.id as id, t1.order_no as orderNo, t1.risk_point as riskPoint, t1.order_note as orderNote, t1.order_num as orderNum, t1.trx_order_id as trxOrderId, t1.status as status, t1.audit_result as auditResult, t3.payee_name as name, t2.merchant_name as merchantName, t1.create_time as createTime, t3.amount as amount, t4.user_name as saleName from tbl_order_sheet t1 left join tbl_merchant_info t2 on t1.merchant_id = t2.id left join tbl_trx_order t3 on t1.trx_order_id = t3.id left join sys_user t4 on t2.belong_saler=t4.user_id where 1=1
and t1.order_no like concat('%',#{orderNo},'%')
and t4.user_name like concat('%',#{saleName},'%')
and t2.belong_saler = #{saleId}
${params.dataScope} order by t1.create_time desc
